code: import React,{useContext,useState}from"react";import{ProfileContext}from"../context/ProfileContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Compose(){const{profiles}=useContext(ProfileContext);const[selectedProfile,setSelectedProfile]=useState(profiles[0]);const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const generateMessage=()=>{setMessage(`AI-generated message based on ${selectedProfile} profile.`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"compose-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"AI Messaging"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-selector",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Select Profile:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:selectedProfile,onChange:e=>setSelectedProfile(e.target.value),children:profiles.map((profile,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:profile,children:profile},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"message-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:message,readOnly:true,placeholder:"AI-generated message will appear here..."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:generateMessage,children:"\u2728 Generate AI Message"})]});}
